Actions.Name: Flame Dance
Actions.Effects: Dash 1, then deal piercing [fray] damage to a different character in range 6.

Actions.Name: Carnivale
Actions.Description: The Fire dancer summons a bomb in range 4.

Summons.Name: Bomb
Summons.SummonEffects: When any character enters its space, it explodes for a small blast area effect explosion. Characters within become vulnerable, then must save or take 2 piercing damage twice, or just 2 piercing damage on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Juggle
Actions.Description: The [name] starts juggling flames. While in this stance, at the start and end of their turn, they may dash 2, then deal 2 piercing damage as an area effect to all foes in range 3.
